long_description: . Authors: Ira Spring and Harvey Manning. Softcover; 254 pages; color photographs and maps. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2010. The authors combine over 100 years of expertise on the boot worn trails of the region and they are inarguably experts on this topic. Lively and interesting text features humorous observations, historical tidbits and conservation messages that will be enjoyed by all. Full color photographs illustrate the first hand descriptions of the routes.
short_description: 100 Classic Hikes of Washington sample the finest of Washington State's alpine scenery with 100 hikes in the Evergreen State; required material for outdoor fanatics.
